abstract: As hedge funds and mutual funds begin to adopt each other’s traditional strategies, JPMorgan Chase thinks it has come up with a way to capitalize on the trend.
snippet: As hedge funds and mutual funds begin to adopt each other’s traditional strategies, JPMorgan Chase thinks it has come up with a way to capitalize on the trend.
lead_paragraph: As hedge funds and mutual funds begin to adopt each other’s traditional strategies, JPMorgan Chase thinks it has come up with a way to capitalize on the trend.

headline.main: JPMorgan Starts Group to Service Fund Sector
